name: Super Bottle Brothers 3
description:
Controls:

AD to move and Space the jump.

Mouse to shoot (if u have ammo).

Small project for the Mini Jame Gam #8 GameJam.

Sadly we didn't completely finish everything we wanted to implement. Still, we wanted to share one of the first games we created. Long way ahead and stay tuned for super Bottle Brothers 4 ;D. 
There is not really an end implemented just try to break the game ;D.

Credits to:
Raphael Lämmchen

Art & Music:

Created by both of us. Hope u like the guitar.
